title: Strengthening Organizational Development Practical Competencies: English Speaking Proficiency Through VR-Based Multimedia Task Performance

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills and fundamental proficiency in operating digital devices
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can perform five types of multimedia tasks related to science experiments (e.g., virtual lab guidance, data analysis reports) in a VR simulation environment with 80% or higher accuracy
Learners can engage in 10+ minute English oral interactions with peer learners using CALL tools to exchange opinions on science topics
Learners meet interaction quality criteria (e.g., fluency, accuracy, responsiveness) at 70% or higher in 10 or more out of 12 assignments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
